entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being intensely cross at the thought of the Half-Blood Prince. She is described as giving an apprehensive look to Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Hermione's friends who takes a deep breath before diving into the gnarled stump.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of Hermione's friends who takes a deep breath before diving into the gnarled stump.

entities.name: half-blood prince
entities.description: The Half-Blood Prince is mentioned as someone that Hermione is intensely cross at the thought of.

entities.name: gnarled stump
entities.description: A gnarled stump is described as being between Ron and Harry. It springs to life when they dive into it.

relationships.description: Hermione intensely dislikes the Half-Blood Prince.
Ron interacts with the gnarled stump by beating back a vine that tangled itself in Hermione's hair.
